extension.name: plg_mymuse_shipping_price
extension.author: Arboreta
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2013 Arboreta Internet Services. All rights reserved.

field.name: ship_countries_1
field.label: MYMUSE_SHIPCOUNTRY_1_LABEL
field.query: SELECT '' as ship_countries_1 ,' none' as value UNION SELECT country_3_code as ship_countries_1, country_name as value FROM #__mymuse_country ORDER by value
